Justice_retirement_2018.description: Rumors circulated that Justice Kennedy was considering retirement from the Supreme Court, which was later confirmed by his official announcement.

President_inquiry_2019.description: Rumors swirled about a possible impeachment inquiry against President Trump, which was later confirmed by House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's announcement.

Mitt_Senate_2018.event: Mitt Romney running for Utah Senate
Mitt_Senate_2018.description: There were rumors that Mitt Romney would run for the US Senate seat in Utah, which he later confirmed in an official announcement.

Joe_pick_2020.event: Joe Biden announcing Kamala Harris as VP pick
Joe_pick_2020.description: Rumors circulated about Joe Biden selecting Kamala Harris as his running mate, which was later confirmed in his official announcement.

Repeal_(AHCA)_2017.description: Rumors spread about the Republican Party's plan to repeal and replace the Affordable Care Act, which was later announced by the House GOP.

Michael_Advisor_2017.event: Michael Flynn's resignation as National Security Advisor
Michael_Advisor_2017.description: Rumors circulated that Michael Flynn was considering resignation, which was later confirmed when he resigned from his position.

Net_FCC_2017.event: Net neutrality rules repeal by the FCC
Net_FCC_2017.description: There were rumors that the FCC would repeal net neutrality rules, which was later confirmed by an official announcement from the agency.

Rex_State_2018.event: Rex Tillerson's firing as Secretary of State
Rex_State_2018.description: Rumors circulated about Rex Tillerson's possible dismissal, which was later confirmed by President Trump's official announcement.

Paris_withdrawal_2017.description: Rumors spread about the US withdrawing from the Paris Climate Agreement, which was later confirmed by President Trump's announcement.

Jeff_General_2018.event: Jeff Sessions' resignation as Attorney General
Jeff_General_2018.description: Rumors circulated about Jeff Sessions' possible resignation, which was later confirmed when he submitted his resignation letter.

James_Director_2017.event: James Comey's firing as FBI Director
James_Director_2017.description: Rumors spread about James Comey's potential dismissal, which was later confirmed by President Trump's official announcement.

Nancy_again_2018.event: Nancy Pelosi becoming House Speaker again
Nancy_again_2018.description: Rumors circulated that Nancy Pelosi would regain her position as House Speaker, which was later confirmed when she was elected by the House of Representatives.

John_Advisor_2018.event: John Bolton's appointment as National Security Advisor
John_Advisor_2018.description: Rumors circulated about John Bolton being appointed as National Security Advisor, which was later confirmed by President Trump's announcement.

Elizabeth_campaign_2018.event: Elizabeth Warren announcing her presidential campaign
Elizabeth_campaign_2018.description: Rumors spread about Elizabeth Warren's intention to run for president, which was later confirmed by her official campaign announcement.

Betsy_Education_2016.event: Betsy DeVos' nomination for Secretary of Education
Betsy_Education_2016.description: Rumors circulated about Betsy DeVos being nominated for Secretary of Education, which was later confirmed by President-elect Trump's announcement.

Andrew_Director_2018.event: Andrew McCabe's firing as FBI Deputy Director
Andrew_Director_2018.description: Rumors spread about Andrew McCabe's potential dismissal, which was later confirmed by the Department of Justice's announcement.

Merrick_Court_2016.event: Merrick Garland's nomination to the Supreme Court
Merrick_Court_2016.description: Rumors circulated about Merrick Garland being nominated to the Supreme Court, which was later confirmed by President Obama's announcement.

Steve_Council_2017.event: Steve Bannon's removal from the National Security Council
Steve_Council_2017.description: Rumors spread about Steve Bannon's removal from the National Security Council, which was later confirmed by an official announcement.

Paul_Congress_2018.description: Rumors circulated about Paul Ryan's possible retirement from Congress, which was later confirmed by his official announcement.

Amy_Court_2020.event: Amy Coney Barrett's nomination to the Supreme Court
Amy_Court_2020.description: Rumors spread about Amy Coney Barrett being nominated to the Supreme Court, which was later confirmed by President Trump's announcement.

Kirstjen_Security_2019.event: Kirstjen Nielsen's resignation as Secretary of Homeland Security
Kirstjen_Security_2019.description: Rumors circulated about Kirstjen Nielsen's possible resignation, which was later confirmed by her official announcement.

Bill_campaign_2019.event: Bill de Blasio announcing his presidential campaign
Bill_campaign_2019.description: Rumors spread about New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio running for president, which was later confirmed by his official campaign announcement.

Trump_ban_2017.description: Rumors circulated about the Trump administration implementing a travel ban, which was later confirmed by an official announcement and executive order.

Bernie_campaign_2019.event: Bernie Sanders announcing his presidential campaign
Bernie_campaign_2019.description: Rumors spread about Bernie Sanders running for president again, which was later confirmed by his official campaign announcement.

John_Staff_2017.event: John Kelly's appointment as White House Chief of Staff
John_Staff_2017.description: Rumors circulated about John Kelly being appointed as White House Chief of Staff, which was later confirmed by President Trump's announcement.

Withdrawal_Syria_2018.description: Rumors spread about the US withdrawing troops from Syria, which was later confirmed by President Trump's official announcement.

Pete_campaign_2019.event: Pete Buttigieg announcing his presidential campaign
Pete_campaign_2019.description: Rumors circulated about Pete Buttigieg running for president, which was later confirmed by his official campaign announcement.

Nikki_UN_2018.event: Nikki Haley's resignation as US Ambassador to the UN
Nikki_UN_2018.description: Rumors spread about Nikki Haley's possible resignation, which was later confirmed by her official announcement.

Impeachment_Ukraine_2019.event: Impeachment inquiry against President Trump over Ukraine
Impeachment_Ukraine_2019.description: Rumors circulated about an impeachment inquiry against President Trump related to his interactions with Ukraine, which was later confirmed by House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's announcement.
